僆字的基本解释

僆
liàn
雏鸡。
双生。

僆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liàn］
［《廣韻》郎甸切，去霰，來。］
小鸡，鸡之未长成者。
[②]［liǎn］
［《廣韻》力展切，上獮，來。］
见“僆2子”。

僆字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　僆； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页115第21
【集韻】力展切，音輦。雙生子也。【揚子·方言】秦晉之閒，謂之僆子。　又【類篇】力健切，音?。【爾雅·釋畜】未成雞僆。【郭註】今江東呼雞少者曰僆。　又【集韻】陵延切，音連。義同。

僆字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
僆字的起名意思

暂无。

僆
Basic explanation of words
僆
liàn
chicken.
twin.
僆
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liàn］
["Guangyun" Lang Dian cut, go to ha, come. ]
A chicken, a chicken that has not grown up.
[②]［liǎn］
["Guangyun" strives to cut, go up, come. ]
See "僆2子".
僆
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　僆; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 115 21
【Jiyun】Strongly cut and cut the sound. Twins too. 【Yangtze Dialect】The leisure of Qin and Jin Dynasties is called Yizi.　[Classes] Li Jian cut, sound?. 【Erya·Shi Hu】Untiled chicken. [Guo's Note] Today, those who call the chicken in the east of the river say 僆.　[Jiyun] Ling Yanqie, the sound is continuous. The same meaning.
